fixed: Bastion won't respond to chat conversations if it has no content.
improved: If server doesn't have an icon, Bastion would now show the server's acronym in instead of showing a generic Discord logo.
added: You can now sell roles in your server using the new `roleStore` command. `roleStore` also lists the roles for sale in your server.
Selling roles in your server? Server members can buy them using the `buyRole` command, provided they have enought Bastion Currencies.
